experiences.description: Led the development and maintenance of data pipelines for various clients in the finance and retail sectors. Implemented automated data quality checks and monitoring systems. Mentored junior data engineers.

Designed and built ETL processes to ingest data from diverse sources into a cloud-based data warehouse (AWS Redshift). Optimized SQL queries for performance and scalability. Collaborated with data scientists to build machine learning models.

Collected, cleaned, and analyzed large datasets to identify trends and insights. Created visualizations and reports to communicate findings to stakeholders. Supported the development of data-driven decision-making processes.

education.description: Spent a semester at Stanford University as part of an exchange program, focusing on advanced topics in machine learning and data mining.
Specialized in data engineering and big data technologies. Conducted research on distributed data processing frameworks.
Graduated with honors, focusing on fundamental computer science principles and software development.
